text: No Mercy is a 1986 American action crime thriller movie directed by Richard Pearce. It stars Richard Gere, Kim Basinger, Jeoren Krabb√©, George Dzundza, Terry Kinney, Ely Pouget and was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 action movies Category:1986 crime thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Pearce Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:Movies set in Louisiana
